titles.title: 308 Savior Lead Me Lest I Stray

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Saviour lead me lest I stray
(lest I stray)
Gently lead me all the way
(all the way)
I am safe when by Thy side
(by Thy side)
I would in Thy love abide

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lead me - lead me
Saviour lead me lest I stray
Gently down
The stream of time
Lead me Saviour
All the way

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thou the refuge of my soul
(of my soul)
When life's
Stormy billows roll
(billows roll)
I am safe when Thou art nigh
(Thou art nigh)
On Thy mercy I rely

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Saviour lead me till at last
(till at last)
When the storm of life is past
(life is past)
I shall reach the land of day
(land of day)
Where all tears
Are wiped away
